failedload.otherError:
Unreachable page

The page could not be loaded successfully. The following error occurred:

$1

The first step you could try is reloading the page, by default mapped to r in normal mode. If the error persists, make sure you typed the url correctly. Alternatively, the website might not support the '$2' protocol. Finally, please check your internet connection and DNS settings.
failedload.sslError:
Unreachable page

The page could not be loaded successfully. The following error occurred:

$1

You can enable automatic HTTP redirects with :set redirecttohttp.
Alternatively, you can choose to go there just once via this HTTP link: $2
Finally, you can control what to do with invalid certificates by changing permissioncertificateerror.
